title: Keen: Art
content:
I finnally have figured out what I'd use my Keen Fansite for.

I now am happy to announce that Keen: Art is now public!

You may visit the gallery at [url=http://www.ck.najawa.com]www.ck.najawa.com[/url]. You can upload images, and post them there for all to see. I kinda wanna gather up every scrap of Keen art out there, and then make is accessable by way of the "Search Function".

So, K:A is open on Jan 1, 2006.

Enjoy.

Please; don't post art for other users; only the author may post an image. No official keen sprites are wanted; as these are boring, and anyone can access them at any time. Thanks!!!Tough Guys Can Fix Their Own Problems!!!
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Prisoner.jpg[/img]
*Under Self Inflicted Posting Restriction*
Visit My site at [url=http://www.najawa.com]www.najawa.com[/url]
[url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?Najawa]Click Here!!! Please!!![/url]
-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Keen: Art
content: Yes, rather interesting idea! I've always wanted to make a Keen art site, but seems it's too late now. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Keen: Art
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img]
